topic.title: <Button>
topic.p: <Button/> is a control for user to execute a command.

topic.title: ClickOnMouseUp
topic.p: The default value for this property is true, but it could be different in sub classes.
When this property is true, Clicked raises when the mouse button is released. When this property is false, Clicked raises when the mouse button is pressed.

topic.title: AutoFocus
topic.p: The default value for this property is true, but it could be different in sub classes.

When this property is true:
The button is focused when the mouse button is pressed.
The button is focused when it is executed by a ALT sequence.
The button accepts focus by TAB.

topic.title: Clicked
topic.p: This event raises when it is clicked, or it is activated by a ALT sequence.
